form.name: companyName
form.title: Company Name
form.description: What is the name of your startup or business?

form.name: tagline
form.title: Tagline
form.description: What is a brief, catchy phrase that describes your company or product?

form.name: problem
form.title: Problem
form.description: What is the problem your startup aims to solve?

form.name: solution
form.title: Solution
form.description: What is your product or service and how does it solve the problem?

form.name: targetAudience
form.title: Target Audience
form.description: Who are your target customers or users?

form.name: uniqueSellingPoints
form.title: Unique Selling Points
form.description: What are the key features that differentiate your product or service from competitors?

form.name: businessModel
form.title: Business Model
form.description: How does your company plan to generate revenue and create value?

form.name: traction
form.title: Traction & Milestones
form.description: What are your demonstrated progress and achievements?

form.name: marketingStrategy
form.title: Marketing Strategy
form.description: What are the channels and tactics you will use to acquire customers and grow the business?

form.name: competitiveLandscape
form.title: Competitive Landscape
form.description: What is the analysis of the competition, including direct and indirect competitors and potential threats?

form.name: teamMembers
form.title: Team Members
form.description: Who are the key team members and what are their relevant experience and roles in the company?

form.name: financialProjections
form.title: Financial Projections
form.description: What are the high-level financial forecasts for the next few years?

form.name: fundingRequirements
form.title: Funding Requirements
form.description: How much funding is the company seeking and how will it be used to achieve its goals?

form.name: callToAction
form.title: Call-to-Action
form.description: What is the desired action from the audience, such as investment, partnership, or other desired action?
